objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#e0f7fa'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#80deea'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='accentGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#4db6ac'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#26a69a'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><g opacity='0.1'><path d='M200,200 Q540,100 880,200 T200,200 Z' fill='#004d40' transform='rotate(0,540,540)'/><path d='M200,200 Q540,100 880,200 T200,200 Z' fill='#004d40' transform='rotate(72,540,540)'/><path d='M200,200 Q540,100 880,200 T200,200 Z' fill='#004d40' transform='rotate(144,540,540)'/><path d='M200,200 Q540,100 880,200 T200,200 Z' fill='#004d40' transform='rotate(216,540,540)'/><path d='M200,200 Q540,100 880,200 T200,200 Z' fill='#004d40' transform='rotate(288,540,540)'/></g><g opacity='0.8'><path d='M-100,800 Q540,750 1180,800 L1180,1080 L-100,1080 Z' fill='url(#accentGradient)'/></g><g><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='6' fill='#004d40'/><circle cx='130' cy='100' r='6' fill='#004d40'/><circle cx='160' cy='100' r='6' fill='#004d40'/><circle cx='980' cy='100' r='6' fill='#004d40'/><circle cx='950' cy='100' r='6' fill='#004d40'/><circle cx='920' cy='100' r='6' fill='#004d40'/></g><g opacity='0.3'><path d='M200,880 L240,920 L280,880 L320,920 L360,880 L400,920 L440,880 L480,920 L520,880 L560,920 L600,880 L640,920 L680,880 L720,920 L760,880 L800,920 L840,880 L880,920' stroke='#ffffff' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
Divided Compartments • Easy to Clean • Carrying Handle
Modern Design • Dishwasher Safe • Space-Saving

product_details.name: Mint Dreams Kitchen Utensil Caddy - Modern Stylish Organizer
product_details.description:
• Elegant mint-colored utensil holder with cute fork and spoon design
• Spacious divided compartments for organized storage
• Convenient carrying handle for easy transport
• Durable plastic construction that's easy to clean
• Perfect size for countertop organization
• Ideal for storing cooking utensils, silverware, and kitchen tools
• Modern minimalist design complements any kitchen decor
• Practical solution for decluttering kitchen counters
• Dishwasher safe for effortless cleaning
• Compact dimensions save valuable counter space

banner_details:
This banner features a clean and modern product promotion design for a kitchen utensil caddy. Centered on the layout is a mint-colored product image (`product_image`) that aligns with the overall theme. Above the product, bold and large heading text (`heading`) introduces the brand or product line in a deep teal shade. Supporting subheading (`subheading`) and tagline (`tagline`) follow beneath, styled in sophisticated serif and italic fonts, reinforcing the product’s modern and elegant appeal. Just below the product image, informative feature text (`description`) highlights the product’s key benefits in bullet form. At the bottom, a large white price text (`price`) stands out over a deep aqua curved shape, paired with a rounded call-to-action button (`cta_button`) containing the text `cta`.

**Color Palette:**
- Mint: #e0f7fa
- Aqua Blue: #80deea
- Teal: #004d40
- Dark Teal: #00695c
- Accent Gradient (from): #4db6ac
- Accent Gradient (to): #26a69a
- White: #ffffff
product_color: The product image features a refreshing and modern color palette dominated by a soft pastel turquoise (#ADE3DF) on the organizer base, which creates a calming and clean aesthetic. The utensils contrast beautifully in shiny metallic silver (#C0C0C0) and gunmetal gray (#4D4D4D) for the whisk, highlighting their utility and sleek design. The black utensil icons on the container (#1E1E1E) add a bold, minimalistic accent, drawing attention without overpowering the softness of the main color. The subtle blending of cool and neutral tones together emphasizes both hygiene and style, ideal for a kitchen-themed advertisement. These hues offer a fresh, elegant, and functional vibe.
